body:
> @kopax uglify is abandoned, please switch on terser-webpack-plugin https://github.com/webpack-contrib/terser-webpack-plugin

It seems thay haven't change their code since July: https://github.com/webpack-contrib/uglifyjs-webpack-plugin/releases

Note that `react-styleguidist` is not my module, I have reported your advice here: https://github.com/webpack/webpack/issues/9794#issuecomment-540596331

I am not sure if issues come from the minification at all.

I need a fix at least for my documentations.

> Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists.

You must have an issue with your client. The repository is public, if you want to make sure, just fork the repository. All my repositories are having the same issue and all are public.
